General.Name: Zhejiang Huatong Meat Products Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Huatong Meat Products Co., Ltd. engages in the livestock and poultry slaughtering business. It is also involved in livestock and poultry slaughtering and processing, livestock and poultry breeding, feed processing, and deep processing of meat products; and sale of related products. The company primarily offers fresh pork, fresh poultry, feed, ham, and other products. Zhejiang Huatong Meat Products Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Yiwu, China.
